subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|酉|旨|c1=s|c2=p|t1=oxygenated functional group|ls=psc}}. Modelled after {{zh-l|脂|lipid}} with a radical input from other oxygenated organic compounds such as {{zh-l|醇|alcohol}} and {{zh-l|酸|acid}}, referring to ester linkages in lipids like [[glyceride]]s.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{zh-l|脂|lipid}}, referring to ester linkages in lipids like [[glyceride]]s.
